83427.text: Adds a metric apiserver_request_error_total to kube-apiserver. This metric tallies the number of request_errors encountered by verb, group, version, resource, subresource, scope, component, and code.
83427.markdown: Adds a metric apiserver_request_error_total to kube-apiserver. This metric tallies the number of request_errors encountered by verb, group, version, resource, subresource, scope, component, and code. ([#83427](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83427), [@logicalhan](https://github.com/logicalhan)) [SIG API Machinery and Instrumentation]
83427.author: logicalhan

83591.text: Add data cache flushing during unmount device for GCE-PD driver in Windows Server.
83591.markdown: Add data cache flushing during unmount device for GCE-PD driver in Windows Server. ([#83591](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83591), [@jingxu97](https://github.com/jingxu97)) [SIG Storage and Windows]

83692.text: kube-scheduler now fallbacks to emitting events using core/v1 Events when events.k8s.io/v1beta1 is disabled.

83789.text: Fixed panic when accessing CustomResources of a CRD with x-kubernetes-int-or-string.
83789.markdown: Fixed panic when accessing CustomResources of a CRD with x-kubernetes-int-or-string. ([#83789](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83789), [@sttts](https://github.com/sttts)) [SIG API Machinery]
83789.author: sttts

83911.text: Fixed an issue with informers missing an `Added` event if a recently deleted object was immediately recreated at the same time the informer dropped a watch and relisted.
83911.markdown: Fixed an issue with informers missing an `Added` event if a recently deleted object was immediately recreated at the same time the informer dropped a watch and relisted. ([#83911](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83911), [@matte21](https://github.com/matte21)) [SIG API Machinery]
83911.author: matte21

83951.text: Fix handling tombstones in pod-disruption-budged controller.
83951.markdown: Fix handling tombstones in pod-disruption-budged controller. ([#83951](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83951), [@zouyee](https://github.com/zouyee)) [SIG Apps]
83951.author: zouyee

83956.text: Switched intstr.Type to sized integer to follow API guidelines and improve compatibility with proto libraries
83956.markdown: Switched intstr.Type to sized integer to follow API guidelines and improve compatibility with proto libraries ([#83956](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83956), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery]

83968.text: Upgrade to etcd client 3.3.17 to fix bug where etcd client does not parse IPv6 addresses correctly when members are joining, and to fix bug where failover on multi-member etcd cluster fails certificate check on DNS mismatch
83968.markdown: Upgrade to etcd client 3.3.17 to fix bug where etcd client does not parse IPv6 addresses correctly when members are joining, and to fix bug where failover on multi-member etcd cluster fails certificate check on DNS mismatch ([#83968](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/83968), [@jpbetz](https://github.com/jpbetz)) [SIG API Machinery and Cloud Provider]
83968.author: jpbetz

84223.text:
Bumps metrics-server version to v0.3.6 for following bugfix:
- Don't break metric storage when duplicate pod metrics encountered causing hpa to fail

  - Don't break metric storage when duplicate pod metrics encountered causing hpa to fail ([#84223](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/84223), [@olagacek](https://github.com/olagacek)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]

84321.text: CSI detach timeout increased from 10 seconds to 2 minutes

84391.text: Change kube-proxy's default node IP back to 127.0.0.1, if this is incorrect, please use --bind-address to set the correct address

84963.markdown: Kube-apiserver: Fixed a regression accepting patch requests > 1MB ([#84963](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/84963), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
